tasks.title: Review column layout and dimensions
tasks.description: Review the proposed column layout and dimensions for the new cafeteria at TU Munich to ensure they align with structural requirements.

tasks.title: Increase column diameters
tasks.description: Update the design to increase the column diameters by 10 cm as per the structural engineer's calculations.

tasks.title: Adjust layout for increased column diameters
tasks.description: Adjust the column layout to accommodate the increased column diameters.

tasks.title: Review updated column layout and dimensions
tasks.description: Review the revised drawings with updated column diameters and adjusted layout.

tasks.title: Review proposed beam dimensions
tasks.description: Review the proposed beam dimensions in the updated design to ensure their suitability for spanning the larger distances between the adjusted columns.

tasks.title: Perform detailed calculations and design for beam joints
tasks.description: Begin detailed calculations and design for the beam joints to ensure they meet the required structural and safety standards.

tasks.title: Share preliminary results for beam joint design
tasks.description: Share the preliminary results of the detailed calculations and design for the beam joints with the architect for alignment.

tasks.title: Coordinate further design input
tasks.description: Coordinate with the architect if there are additional aspects of the design that require the structural engineer's input.
